name: Dorito Shuriken
description:
Game made for the NoneJam 5

Theme -> "Boss fight"

The jam version of the game it's not completely finished, so the game is not at its full potential, i didn't have time to add everything i wanted :(

However, there will be a finished version of the game soon :)

Left and right arrows to move

Z - jump

X - Shoot

C - Dash

Soundtrack
